@ParametersAreNonnullByDefault

Package org.prebake.service.plan

Tracks plan files to maintain a set of products and infer a graph of dependencies between those products.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
Interface Description
Recipe.Chef  
 

Class Summary
Class Description
Action A step in a recipe that involves invoking a tool.
Ingredient A step in a recipe that involves producing a Product.
PlanGraph A directed graph where nodes are Products and an edge exists between to nodes where the source produces outputs that might be inputs to the target.
PlanGraph.Builder  
PlanGraph.Walker  
PlanGrapher Maintains a sparse graph of product dependencies.
Planner Keeps the set of products and the PlanGrapher up-to-date.
Product A possible goal declared in a plan file.
Recipe A plan to build a set of products by preparing some initial ingredients, that then allows us to prepare more complicated ingredients.
 

Enum Summary
Enum Description
Action.Field Property names in the YSON representation.
Product.Field Property names in the YSON representation.
 

Exception Summary
Exception Description
DependencyCycleException Thrown when a product is transitively its own prerequisite.
MissingProductException Thrown when the user tries to create a recipe for a product that does exist, or a recipe would require deriving a product from a template based on incomplete information.
 

Package org.prebake.service.plan Description

Tracks plan files to maintain a set of products and infer a graph of dependencies between those products.
